startIntroPart1: With brave heart, nothing to fraid
declaringWar: Do you know what your blood looks like?
introduction: People fight, I fight. Peopel peace, I peace

[+1 Food, +1 Gold, +1 Production, +3 Faith, +1 Happiness] from [All] tiles [in all cities]

+2% Strength for Military units for every Happiness

May buy [All] units for [80] [Culture] [in all cities]

+[10] happiness from each type of luxury resource
